caption:
These aren’t your everyday ‘melt in your mouth shortbread cookies.’ These cookies have a secret ingredient (@martinellisco) in the dough AND in the apple glaze 🤤 You only need 5 ingredients, and you probably already have them in your kitchen too. It may be controversial, but we think these are the best cookies to have on your holiday cookie tray ✨🍂
.
Ingredients needed:
➡️ @martinellisco Sparkling Cider
➡️ Powdered Sugar
➡️ Flour
➡️ Butter
➡️ Salt
.
🔗 Find the full recipe at www.WinCoFoods.com/recipes.
.
.
.
